entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Daniel's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:18 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 5:30 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Temperature: 2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 68 %
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: N 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023
